Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CHILDREN AND FAMILIES

Title: Relates to access to birth certificates of persons who have been adopted
Summary: Grants access to a certified copy of the birth certificate of an adopted person without requiring judicial review; requires such birth certificate to state that the certificate is a certified copy of a sealed record and is not valid for identification with the adoption facts recited.
LawCode: Amd ยง114, Dom Rel L; amd ยง4132, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law and the public health law, in relation to access to birth records by adoptees
